job.title: Software Engineer, Apple Pay
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtat apple new ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly imagine what you could do here bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplishltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtthe apple pay server team is a rare engineering group within apple we provide critical services for the company across every product line from manufacturing to customer facing our services span across the entire lifecycle of most apple hardware and services by designing and implementing services that are tightly coupled with hardware we support the ongoing need to improve security of customers sensitive data financial or otherwise and privacy many of our services are seen in the ios security guide and are publicly discussed on internet forumsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtwe are looking for years experience in server software programming using javaltbrgtltbrgtwe want you to have passion for creating the highest quality softwareltbrgtltbrgtwe want you to have outstanding analytical and problem solving skillsltbrgtltbrgtwe are seeking experienced in designing ampamp developing highly scalable applicationsltbrgtltbrgtbelieves in and practices testdriven developmentltbrgtltbrgtstrong communication collaboration ampamp interpersonal skillsltbrgtltbrgtexperienceunderstanding of security ampamp cryptography is a plusltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtimagine the freedom of a startup with the funding and laser focus of the most valuable company in the world as a senior software engineer on the apple pay server teamltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt you will participate in initiatives that are essential to the success of upcoming product launches and product security initiatives ltbrgtltbrgt you will participate and collaborate to solve complex problems with the opportunity to invent innovative solutionsltbrgtltbrgt you will work for a company where you will have the opportunity to do the best work of your lifeltbrgtltbrgt you will develop the next generation of cloud support that powers apple payltbrgtltbrgt you will be responsible for designing and developing large scale platforms that can support future apple pay functionalityltbrgtltbrgt you will have the opportunity to explore and contribute to a wide range of technologiesltbrgtltbrgt you will work collaboratively with apples ios engineering team nfc team security team and external partners to define the next hot feature of apple payltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtbs or ms in computer scienceengineering or equivalent practical experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtadditional requirementsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtapple is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity we also take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants including minorities women protected veterans and individuals with disabilities ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtapple will not discriminate or retaliate against applicants who inquire about disclose or discuss their compensation or that of other applicantsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtwe promote innovation and new technology to further improve our creative output multifaceted smart people and inspiring innovative technologies are the norm here you will be part of building an extraordinary team were looking for a hardworking and passionate person to join this amazing team if you feel this is you wed love to hear from youltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtrole number ltbrgtltbrgt
